an4.87:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sekho hoti pāṭipado;
an4.87:5.4: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, rañño khattiyassa muddhāvasittassa jeṭṭho putto ābhiseko anabhisitto macalappatto;
an4.87:5.5: evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sekho hoti pāṭipado, anuttaraṃ yogakkhemaṃ patthayamāno viharati.
an4.87:5.6: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo samaṇamacalo hoti.
an4.87:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati, no ca kho aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati.
an4.87:6.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo samaṇapuṇḍarīko hoti.
an4.87:7.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati, aṭṭha ca vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati.
an4.87:7.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo samaṇapadumo hoti.
an4.87:8.1: * Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo samaṇesu samaṇasukhumālo hoti?
an4.87:8.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yācitova bahulaṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuñjati, appaṃ ayācito;
an4.87:8.3: yācitova bahulaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjati, appaṃ ayācito;
an4.87:8.4: yācitova bahulaṃ senāsanaṃ paribhuñjati, appaṃ ayācito;
an4.87:8.5: yācitova bahulaṃ gilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṃ paribhuñjati, appaṃ ayācito.
an4.87:8.6: Yehi kho pana sabrahmacārīhi saddhiṃ viharati, tyassa manāpeneva bahulaṃ kāyakammena samudācaranti, appaṃ amanāpena;
an4.87:8.7: manāpeneva bahulaṃ vacīkammena samudācaranti, appaṃ amanāpena;
an4.87:8.8: manāpeneva bahulaṃ manokammena samudācaranti, appaṃ amanāpena;
an4.87:8.9: manāpaṃyeva bahulaṃ upahāraṃ upaharanti, appaṃ amanāpaṃ.
an4.87:8.10: Yāni kho pana tāni vedayitāni pittasamuṭṭhānāni vā semhasamuṭṭhānāni vā vātasamuṭṭhānāni vā sannipātikāni vā utupariṇāmajāni vā visamaparihārajāni vā opakkamikāni vā kammavipākajāni vā, tāni panassa na bahudeva uppajjanti.
an4.87:8.12: Catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ ābhicetasikānaṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṃ nikāmalābhī hoti akicchalābhī akasiralābhī, āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
an4.87:8.13: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo samaṇesu samaṇasukhumālo hoti.
an4.87:9.1: Yañhi taṃ, bhikkhave, sammā vadamāno vadeyya samaṇesu samaṇasukhumāloti, mameva taṃ, bhikkhave, sammā vadamāno vadeyya samaṇesu samaṇasukhumāloti.
an4.87:9.2: Ahañhi, bhikkhave, yācitova bahulaṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuñjāmi, appaṃ ayācito;
an4.87:9.3: yācitova bahulaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjāmi, appaṃ ayācito;
an4.87:9.4: yācitova bahulaṃ senāsanaṃ paribhuñjāmi, appaṃ ayācito;
an4.87:9.5: yācitova bahulaṃ gilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṃ paribhuñjāmi, appaṃ ayācito.
an4.87:9.6: Yehi kho pana bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ viharāmi te me manāpeneva bahulaṃ kāyakammena samudācaranti, appaṃ amanāpena;
an4.87:9.7: manāpeneva bahulaṃ vacīkammena samudācaranti, appaṃ amanāpena;
an4.87:9.8: manāpeneva bahulaṃ manokammena samudācaranti, appaṃ amanāpena;
an4.87:9.9: manāpaṃyeva bahulaṃ upahāraṃ upaharanti, appaṃ amanāpaṃ.
an4.87:9.10: Yāni kho pana tāni vedayitāni pittasamuṭṭhānāni vā semhasamuṭṭhānāni vā vātasamuṭṭhānāni vā sannipātikāni vā utupariṇāmajāni vā visamaparihārajāni vā opakkamikāni vā kammavipākajāni vā, tāni me na bahudeva uppajjanti.
an4.87:9.12: Catunnaṃ kho panasmi jhānānaṃ ābhicetasikānaṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṃ nikāmalābhī akicchalābhī akasiralābhī, āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharāmi.
an4.87:10.1: Yañhi taṃ, bhikkhave, sammā vadamāno vadeyya samaṇesu samaṇasukhumāloti, mameva taṃ, bhikkhave, sammā vadamāno vadeyya samaṇesu samaṇasukhumāloti.
an4.87:10.2: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
